attributes.text: All widget used as scrollbars must implement this interface.
Fired if the user scroll
Fired as soon as the scroll animation ended.

Returns the (computed) value of the property knobFactor.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #knobFactor}.
(Computed) value of knobFactor.

Returns the (computed) value of the property maximum.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #maximum}.
(Computed) value of maximum.

Returns the (computed) value of the property orientation.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #orientation}.
(Computed) value of orientation.

Returns the (computed) value of the property position.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #position}.
(Computed) value of position.
Initial value for property knobFactor.

Calls the apply method and dispatches the change event of the property knobFactor with the default value defined by the class developer. This function can only be called from the constructor of a class.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #knobFactor}.
the default value
Initial value for property maximum.

Calls the apply method and dispatches the change event of the property maximum with the default value defined by the class developer. This function can only be called from the constructor of a class.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #maximum}.
the default value
Initial value for property orientation.

Calls the apply method and dispatches the change event of the property orientation with the default value defined by the class developer. This function can only be called from the constructor of a class.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #orientation}.
the default value
Initial value for property position.

Calls the apply method and dispatches the change event of the property position with the default value defined by the class developer. This function can only be called from the constructor of a class.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #position}.
the default value

Resets the user value of the property knobFactor.

The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depeneding on the property configuration and value availability.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #knobFactor}.

Resets the user value of the property maximum.

The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depeneding on the property configuration and value availability.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #maximum}.

Resets the user value of the property orientation.

The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depeneding on the property configuration and value availability.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #orientation}.

Resets the user value of the property position.

The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depeneding on the property configuration and value availability.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #position}.
Scroll by this offset
The time in milliseconds the slide to should take.

Scrolls by the given offset.

This method automatically corrects the given position to respect the {@link #maximum}.
Number of steps
The time in milliseconds the slide to should take.

Scrolls by the given number of steps.

This method automatically corrects the given position to respect the {@link #maximum}.
Scroll to this position. Must be greater zero.
The time in milliseconds the slide to should take.

Scrolls to the given position.

This method automatically corrects the given position to respect the {@link #maximum}.
New value for property knobFactor.

Sets the user value of the property knobFactor.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #knobFactor}.
The unmodified incoming value.
New value for property maximum.

Sets the user value of the property maximum.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #maximum}.
The unmodified incoming value.
New value for property orientation.

Sets the user value of the property orientation.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #orientation}.
The unmodified incoming value.
New value for property position.

Sets the user value of the property position.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #position}.
The unmodified incoming value.
Factor to apply to the width/height of the knob in relation to the dimension of the underlying area.
The maximum value (difference between available size and content size).
The scroll bar orientation

Position of the scrollbar (which means the scroll left/top of the attached area’s pane)

Strictly validates according to {@link #maximum}. Does not apply any correction to the incoming value. If you depend on this, please use {@link #scrollTo} instead.
